item.title: Metalwork Guild at Imperial
item.author: Owen Leech,
item.description: Well, what can I say? Blacksmithing is one of the most rewarding things I have ever done. The satisfaction that you get from turning a lump of dull metal into something useful or beautiful, and on the rare occasion both, is incomparable to anything else! Don’t get me wrong, a skill like this is very …
